General.name: HELP
General.description: shows the list of all commands

General.name: RTP
General.description: allows you to teleport on random location

General.name: PING
General.description: show the world's tps and ping

General.name: ABOUT
General.description: shows the developer of the addon

Moderators.name: KICK
Moderators.description: kick a specific player in server

Moderators.name: BAN
Moderators.description: allows you to ban a specific player

Moderators.name: CMDSF
Moderators.description: disabled command block logs and popping on chats [MODULE]

Moderators.name: MUTE
Moderators.description: mute a specific player in server

Moderators.name: LAGCLEAR
Moderators.description: kill all items on the ground.

Operators.name: OP
Operators.description: op a specific player in server to immune to any anticheat

Operators.name: NOTIFY
Operators.description: notification when someone got flagged by the anticheat

Operators.name: TRUSTED
Operators.description: add trusted or remove on specific player
